      • getSMTPProperties

        private java.util.Properties getSMTPProperties()
        Returns:
        the appropriate SMTP properties for the particular email client, port no., etc.

      • setupSession

        public boolean setupSession(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Try to set up an email session for the user with the username and password
        Parameters:
        username - the username for the email account
        password - the password for the email account
        Returns:
        true if the user can be logged in; false otherwise

      • constructMimeMessage

        public javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage constructMimeMessage(java.lang.String from,
                                                            java.lang.String to,
                                                            java.lang.String subject,
                                                            java.lang.String content)
                                                     throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                                                            javax.mail.MessagingException
        Parameters:
        from - the email address which is sending the email
        to - a comma-separated list of email addresses to which to send the email
        subject - the subject for the email
        content - the text content of the email
        Returns:
        a MIME message constructed using the given information
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - if the given addresses could not be converted
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if the message could not be constructed

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Send the specified message from the email account for this Sender. Many thanks to Dr Shan He for excerpts of the following code.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent
        username - the username for the email account
        password - the password for the email account
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if the email could not be sent
